articles.title: Peru closes Machu Picchu site as anti-govt protests continue - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: European Union decries ‘disproportionate’ police response to the deadly unrest as protester death toll rises to 45.
articles.content:
Peru has closed its famed historical site Machu Picchu amid continuing anti-government protests, as the European Union decried the police response to the deadly unrest as disproportionate.

articles.title: Britain's Tim Peake retires from European astronaut corps - BBC
articles.description: The British astronaut who inspired millions with his passion for space will concentrate on educational outreach.
articles.content:
UK spaceman Tim Peake is stepping down permanently from his role as a European astronaut.
